Systematic error is responsible for bias @simMeasurementValidityPhysical1993


# Blinding

- Lack of blinding of investigators: Can result in experimenter bias
- Lack of blinding of patients: can result in
    - [Diffusion of treatment effects]({{< var ref-bias.diffusion-of-treatment-effects >}})
    - [Compensatory rivalry]({{< var ref-bias.compensatory-rivalry >}})
    - [Resentful demoralization]({{< var ref-bias.resentful-demoralization >}})

Lack of blinding for PATIENTS can result in.  Lack of blinding of CLINICIANS who deliver the intervention can result in compensatory equalization or diffusion of treatment effects.
